title: BitCoinBeet
author: BitCoinBeet
content: Recently, many new complaints were getting public about BC Game site. Many crypto sites like Blockchair have BC Game ads. Did you sign up personally on BC Game site and what is your experience? How much funds did you deposit, did you win and tried to pay it out again, did you receive your won funds in your own wallet again?

comments.author: jhonjhon
comments.created_time: December 01, 2023, 03:09:51 AMLast edit: December 02, 2023, 03:15:26 AM by jhonjhon
comments.body: I personally did not sign up on any BC gaming sites since I think they are risky. Yes, investing in any gaming site may easily provide profits, but in order to avoid scammers, do your research first by reading reviews and checking the appropriate licensing regulations.  But it's really up to you when your a fond of casino's or gambling then why not, go for a ride   but be mindful to set limit for yourself and only play with money you can afford to lose.

comments.body: If you don't have an accusation then why are you posting in this section about BCGAME? If you took the time to look around the forum, you'd see that they have been solving issues users have had. I'm not sure your reasoning for this post.

comments.author: joeyvee
comments.body: ive been on BC for about 2.5 years now. im a VIP47 with close to 950K wagered. the site was good during the beginning of covid when i first joined. now i feel like hackers and maybe the site itself are running 3rd party scripts while you're playing which will give you loss after loss after loss. they're literally taken away any type of good vip benefits they once had, the "level up spin" used to be daily spin even if you knew you were never going to win more than .50 on that free spin. i have a "vip host" which is an absolute joke (BCGAME_POP) not only did they make me wait from levels 45-47 before assigning me one, ive maybe recived $10 total worth of bonuses in the last two years (for being such a great player). stake seems like much more of a legit site these days not only do i only have a fraction of what ive wagered on BC wagered there, my benefits are 100x better, i get daily, weekly, and monthly bonuses and have cashed out plenty of times without having to deposit just off of building up my bonus cash ive got. if you're on BC and got more questions feel free to hit me up username is "IAmSatoshi"
